stdyInfo.abstract:
Hess Collection Tape 9:

Contents:1 – Compilation -

Thomas M. Hess Indian Studies –

  1. Raven sings to Crow (Martha Lamont #11)
  2. Crow sings her song (M. Lamont #11)
  3. Snohomish “fight” song (M. Lamont)
  4. Mink sings his song Edward Sam
  5. A love song (E. Sam)
  6. Ant sings her song (E. Sam)
  7. Love song (M. Lamont)
  8. Love song (Halkomelem) Levi Lamont
  9. Love song (Florence Sigo)

From Thom Hess Collection , Ethnomusicology Archives (UWEA 95-19.49) University of Washington, Seattle

useStmt.specPerm: Permission must be granted before access to recordings, transcripts and translations is made possible. Permission can be requested from Dr. David Beck (dbeck@ualberta.ca) or by clicking on the request permission link beside the file download button.

otherMat.txt: Audio recording from Hess Collection Tape 49, Thom Hess Collection, Ethnomusicology Archives (UWEA 95-19.49) University of Washington, Seattle.
